data.title: Paul lawrie on LinkedIn: We had the fourth event this week of our Tartan pro tour, congrats to…
data.meta_description: We had the fourth event this week of our Tartan pro tour, congrats to Bradley Neil on the win ( amazing 61-11 in final round) thank you to everyone at…
data.text:
🏆 The results are in! 🌟 After an intense Par 5 showdown, the winner is revealed! Who took home the victory, Bri Teresi or Noah? 🏌️♀️🏌️♂️ Watch the final part to find out and see the thrilling conclusion! Download GolfLync and join the fastest-growing golf community! 📲💬 #GolfLync #GolfShowdown #BriTeresi #Results #GolfCommunity #Par5Challenge #DownloadNow

Risk vs Reward vs Effort in Maintenance: Sometimes you have to take risks. This is also true in your Reliability journey. It is important to understand the effort vs reward for all your maintenance. Sometimes the effort far exceeds the reward, or the risk is so low, that the effort is just not worth it. Everytime you review your maintenance plans, ask the question if the effort is worth the risk/reward? Thanks Bob for the post! #Maintenance #doingitdifferently

"We are here for the golfers, and without them, there is no golf club. That is our main driver for using feedback". - shares Anna Wickberg, Golf Club Manager at Idrefjällens Golfklubb. Effective teamwork and the use of feedback have greatly facilitated her role as a Golf Club Manager. 📊 Wickberg considers it crucial to provide data-driven arguments when suggesting potential improvements to the golf course and presenting these proposals to the Board or other club decision-makers. And the Players 1st Surveys offers exactly that: Clear, documented insights into what golfers enjoy and dislike. #sverige #customerexperiencemanagement #golfindustry #growthegame

Kicking off our new social strategy this month, with lots of new video content, lots of more fun content, and more LinkedIn reporting and 'Impact Sharing' Always liked this PDF style reporting of recent stories and impacts, hopefully it helps us to reach more people. Time will tell... #digitalmarketing

Triumphant Restart: Marítimo Dominates in New Coach's Debut! 🔴🟢 Big win for Marítimo in the debut of their new coach! After a challenging season that resulted in relegation to the second division, the team showed determination and resilience by securing an impressive 4-0 victory over Lank Vilaverdense. 👔 The change in leadership brought a breath of fresh air to the team, with the arrival of the new coach introducing a new vision and game strategy. The immediate on-field response not only reflects the technical quality of the players but also the cohesion and willingness to fight for promotion back to the football elite. 🚀 This is only the beginning of a promising journey, and the foundation laid in this inaugural game may be the key to a successful season. Fans and sponsors can expect a rejuvenated and motivated team, ready to overcome obstacles and aspire to great heights. #Marítimo #Football #SecondDivision #Victory #NewBeginning #MarítimoStrength #LinkedInChallenge5

One of a kind experience and opportunity to do something different at your event. Apply strategy and thought provoking discussion while hearing anecdotes and tales from the most exciting tournaments and championships. An event concept that is completely unique - you can hear a pin drop when these caddies are speaking! Highly engaging! #unique #eventprofs #eventmanagement #caddies #eventstrategy
